billingNotAvailable: Please fill out the sections above before you can see the billing information
confirmationMessage: You have successfully subscribed to the offer. You will receive a confirmation e-mail shortly.
confirmationMessage__: Arguments are a SignupData, defined in models.ts

validation.emailUsed: This email address is already in use
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.emailUnvalidated: The email could not be validated
validation.passwordTooWeak: Password must be at least eight characters and contain a digit and a letter

request.createSignup: An error occurred while signing up
request.openPayPalPopup: The PayPal pop-up is blocked. Please allow pop-ups and click RETRY.
request.getCountries: An error occurred while loading the country list
request.getCustomerCustomFields: An error occurred while loading the customer custom fields
request.getProductCustomFields: An error occurred while loading custom fields for product {productName}
request.getPlan: An error occurred while loading the subscription plan
request.getStates: An error occurred while loading the state list for country {country.name}
request.getStates__: Arguments: { country: { code: string, name: string } }
request.previewInvoice: An error occurred while loading the billing information
request.validateEmail: An error occurred while validating the email

redirectToPayPal: You'll be redirected to PayPal to approve the billing agreement.
